result.notes: Material relating to Veterinary Medicines Directorate VMD inspections (e.g. Inspection reports, agendas, notes). The VMD's own internal inspection schedule.

organization.name: veterinary-medicines-directorate
organization.title: Veterinary Medicines Directorate
organization.description:
The Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) protects animal health, public health and the environment.

VMD is an executive agency, sponsored by the Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs.

Read more at https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/veterinary-medicines-directorate/about

result.title: Good Manufacturing Practice Inspections Team (GMPIT) inspections of manufacturing premises of veterinary medicines

extras.value: Commercial confidentiality reasons.  In addition, for the Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) internal inspections schedule it would not be beneficial for companies to know exactly when the VMD was planning to visit (although companies are given reasonable notice in advance).
